description: Collaborative work management platform combining databases with spreadsheets.

actions.name: create_record
actions.description: Creates a new record in the specified table.

actions.name: delete_record
actions.description: Deletes a record from the specified table

actions.name: find_records
actions.description: Searches for records in the specified table based on criteria.

actions.name: get_record
actions.description: Retrieves a specific record by ID

actions.name: update_record
actions.description: Updates an existing record in the specified table

actions.name: upload_file
actions.description: Uploads a file and attaches it to a record.

triggers.name: new_record
triggers.description: Triggers when a new record is created in the specified table

triggers.name: updated_record
triggers.description: Triggers when a record is updated in the specified table.
